Package com.intellij.execution.wsl

Class WSLDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.execution.wsl.WSLDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WSLDistributionLegacy, WSLDistributionWithRoot

    public class WSLDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single linux distribution in WSL, installed after Fall Creators Update
    See Also:
    WSLUtil, WSLDistributionWithRoot

      • executeOnWsl

        public ProcessOutput executeOnWsl(int timeout,
                                  Consumer<? super ProcessHandler> processHandlerConsumer,
                                  java.lang.String... args)
                           throws ExecutionException
        Creates a patched command line, executes it on wsl distribution and returns output
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in ms
        processHandlerConsumer - consumes process handler just before execution, may be used for cancellation
        args - linux args, eg gem env
        Throws:
        ExecutionException

      • copyFromWsl

        public ProcessOutput copyFromWsl(java.lang.String wslPath,
                                 java.lang.String windowsPath,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalOptions,
                                 Consumer<? super ProcessHandler> handlerConsumer)
                          throws ExecutionException
        Copying changed files recursively from wslPath/ to windowsPath/; with rsync
        Parameters:
        wslPath - source path inside wsl, e.g. /usr/bin
        windowsPath - target windows path, e.g. C:/tmp; Directory going to be created
        additionalOptions - may be used for --delete (not recommended), --include and so on
        handlerConsumer - consumes process handler just before execution. Can be used for fast cancellation
        Returns:
        process output
        Throws:
        ExecutionException

      • patchCommandLine

        public <T extends GeneralCommandLine> T patchCommandLine(T commandLine,
                                                         Project project,
                                                         java.lang.String remoteWorkingDir,
                                                         boolean askForSudo)
        Patches passed command line to make it runnable in WSL context, e.g changes date to ubuntu run "date".

        Environment variables and working directory are mapped to the chain calls: working dir using cd and environment variables using export, e.g bash -c "export var1=val1 && export var2=val2 && cd /some/working/dir && date".

        Method should properly handle quotation and escaping of the environment variables.

        Type Parameters:
        T - GeneralCommandLine or descendant
        Parameters:
        commandLine - command line to patch
        project - current project
        remoteWorkingDir - path to WSL working directory
        askForSudo - true if we need to ask for sudo. To make this work, process handler, created from this command line should be patched using patchProcessHandler(GeneralCommandLine, ProcessHandler)
        Returns:
        original commandLine, prepared to run in WSL context

        public java.lang.String resolveSymlink(java.lang.String path,
                                       int timeoutInMilliseconds)

        Parameters:
        path - path in question
        timeoutInMilliseconds - timeout for execution
        Returns:
        actual file name

      • patchProcessHandler

        public <T extends ProcessHandler> T patchProcessHandler(GeneralCommandLine commandLine,
                                                        T processHandler)
        Patches process handler with sudo listener, asking user for the password
        Parameters:
        commandLine - patched command line
        processHandler - process handler, created from patched commandline
        Returns:
        passed processHandler, patched with sudo listener if any
